SEARCH
Package Persistence

Class TransitionsController

java.lang.Object
Persistence.TransitionsController
public class TransitionsController extends Object
The TransitionsController class acts as a controller for managing transitions between states, handling the creation, retrieval, and deletion of transition matrices.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TransitionsController()
    Constructs an instance of TransitionsController with an associated CSVController.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public Vector<Pair<Pair<String,String>,int[][]>> getAll() throws IOException
      Retrieves information about all transition matrices.
      Returns:
      A Vector containing Pair objects representing the names, associated alphabets, and transition matrix values of all transition matrices.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while retrieving transition matrices.

    • getTransition

      public Pair<Pair<String,String>,int[][]> getTransition(String name) throws IOException
      Retrieves information about a specific transition matrix by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the transition matrix to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Pair object representing the name, associated alphabet, and transition matrix values of the specified transition matrix.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while retrieving the transition matrix.

    • getStats

      public Pair<Pair<String,String>,int[][]> getStats(String fileName) throws IOException
      Retrieves information about a specific transition matrix by file name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file name of the transition matrix to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Pair object representing the name, associated alphabet, and transition matrix values of the specified transition matrix.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while retrieving the transition matrix.

    • createTransition

      public void createTransition(String name, String alphabetName, int[][] transitions) throws IOException
      Creates a new transition matrix with the specified name, associated alphabet name, and transition matrix values.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new transition matrix.
      alphabetName - The name of the associated alphabet.
      transitions - The 2D array representing the transition matrix values.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating the transition matrix.

    • deleteTransition

      public void deleteTransition(String name) throws IOException, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes a specified transition matrix by name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the transition matrix to delete.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while deleting the transition matrix.
      FileNotDeleted - If the file cannot be deleted.

    • getTextFromFile

      public String getTextFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves the text content of a file specified by the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the file to read.
      Returns:
      The text content of the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getWordsFromFile

      public String[] getWordsFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves an array of words from a file specified by the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the file to read.
      Returns:
      An array of words extracted from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • getFrequenciesFromFile

      public int[] getFrequenciesFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves an array of frequencies from a file specified by the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the file to read.
      Returns:
      An array of integer frequencies extracted from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.
